caption.p: Evolutionary origin of plants per pellet sampled in pre‐monsoon (a) and post‐monsoon (b) diet of Royle's pika in the western Himalaya (CA: Centrasiatic; EH: Himalayan Endemic; HO: Holarctic; MA: South East Asiatic Malaysian; SJ: Sino Japanese or Eastern Asiatic; TR: Tropical; YU: South East Chinese; details of the study sites are provided in Figure 1)
